adjectives.description: drouthy (comparative drouthier or more drouthy, superlative drouthiest or most drouthy)

examples: The drouthy sandy soils are not well adapted to the grain crops that grow throughout the summer but may be used for wheat or rye, the deep-rooting legumes, or timber.
At parting, they bestowed a cup on him of a miraculous make, for it was ever full of wine, let the drinker be ever so drouthy.
